AUROC=0.6981170598911071	AUPRC=0.6642966349953996	Accuracy=0.6428571428571429	MCC=0.26307031771949063	Recall=0.37280701754385964	Precision=0.6692913385826772	f1_score=0.4788732394366197

######NOTE#######
#According to help_documentation of sklearn.metrics.classification_report:in binary classification, recall of the positive class is also known as sensitivity; recall of the negative class is specificity#

              precision    recall  f1-score   support

     control       0.63      0.86      0.73       290
        case       0.67      0.37      0.48       228

   micro avg       0.64      0.64      0.64       518
   macro avg       0.65      0.61      0.60       518
weighted avg       0.65      0.64      0.62       518
